headline: 151 case arrived minty fresh
text: Hector filmed the seal checks before shipping and added silica packs inside the shipper. The booster box case showed up flawless and already beat the last three sold comps.

headline: Shrink-wrap inspection on the spot
text: Met up for Hidden Fates ETBs and he brought a UV light plus tamper tape. We checked every seam before cash changed hands and I flipped one the same night.

headline: Packaging is collector-grade
text: My Crown Zenith premium box was double-boxed with corner protectors and labeled "do not crush." Tracking updates hit my inbox and Discord before the carrier scans posted.
valueProps: Live tracking pings via email + Discord

headline: Case builder made the flip easy
text: I pre-ordered an Obsidian Flames bundle through Hector and he had comps printed, sleeves ready, and meetup notes in the Drop Kit. Listed the extras and they were gone within 48 hours.
valueProps: Resale guide included in Drop Kit
